name: miniorange_inc/saml-sp-single-sign-on
description: Magento SAML Single Sign on (SSO) extension acts as a SAML Service Provider which can be configured to establish the trust between the extension and a SAML capable Identity Providers to securely authenticate the user to Magento 2 site. Execute Magento SSO using Azure AD, Azure B2C, Okta, ADFS, Keycloak, OneLogin, Salesforce, Google Apps (G Suite), Shibboleth, Ping, Auth0 and other IdPs (Identity Providers)
